This is sample for spec

```
this block is ignored!
```

And those ``` are ALSO ignored

```ruby
# first block
class ItsAClass
  def its_multiline
    Time.now.year < 2018
  end
end
  
```

Then, lets try again:

```ruby
def second
  puts "WTF??? I just typed ```"
end
# this comment goes to first statement!

second_and_half = 5**6
# and this for second
```

And again:

```ruby
third!
